privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your data and respect your privacy

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.description: At AlwaysConvert, we take your privacy extremely seriously. Our service is designed with privacy as a core principle, not an afterthought.

noCollection.title: No Data Collection
noCollection.desc: We don't collect, store, or track personal information or uploaded media.

noUpload.title: No Server Uploads
noUpload.desc: Your files stay on your device and are processed entirely in your browser.

noTracking.title: No Tracking
noTracking.desc: We don't use cookies or tracking technologies to monitor your activity.

howWorks.title: How Our Service Works
howWorks.description: Our media conversion service operates entirely within your web browser:
points: When you select a file, it's loaded into your browser's memory.
Conversion is performed using JavaScript directly in your browser.
The converted file is generated in your browser and offered for download.
At no point is your file or any information about it transmitted to our servers or any third parties.

adSense.title: Google AdSense Usage
adSense.description: We use Google AdSense to support our free services. Here's how it works:

section1.title: 1. Automatic Placement
points: Google will automatically insert ads at optimal points
It will use algorithms to maximize engagement
It will place ads where clicks are most likely

section4.title: 4. Customization
points: We can set some basic rules
Define zones where we DON'T want ads

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.description: For transparency, here is some technical information about how our service operates:
points: We use the HTML5 File API to handle files in the browser.
Media conversions use the browser's built-in canvas capabilities and Web Workers for processing.
For video conversions, we use client-side libraries that run entirely in your browser.
Our website is served over HTTPS to ensure your connection to our service is secure.

standardPolicy.title: Legal Details of the Privacy Policy
standardPolicy.intro: AlwaysConvert is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy clearly and transparently explains our data handling practices.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect limited information through Google Analytics, including pages visited, IP addresses, browser types, device types, and referral URLs, to enhance functionality and content.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use collected data exclusively to analyze user behavior and improve website performance. We do not sell, rent, or share this information with third parties.

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your website experience. You can control cookie preferences via your browser settings, though disabling cookies might impact functionality.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access. However, no data transmission or storage method is completely secure.

sections.title: Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party sites. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our website is not designed for children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect their personal data. If you suspect we've collected data from a minor, please contact us immediately.

sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy without prior notice. Changes are effective immediately upon posting. Check regularly for updates.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: For questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@alwaysconvert.app.

standardPolicy.consent: By using AlwaysConvert, you consent to this Privacy Policy. Please discontinue use if you disagree with these terms.
